UsernamePasswordRequest(String, String, AccountStore) - Constructor for class com.stormpath.sdk.authc.UsernamePasswordRequest
Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified username (or email) and password, ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).

Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified username (or email) and password, ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).

Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified usernameOrEmail and password for an end-user accessing the application from the specified host, also ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).

Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified usernameOrEmail and password for an end-user accessing the application from the specified host, also ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).
